type.name: org.gradle.process.ExecResult
type.description: * Represents the result of running an external process.

method.name: assertNormalExitValue
method.description: * Throws an {@link org.gradle.process.internal.ExecException} if the process exited with a non-zero exit value. * * @return this * @throws ExecException if the process exited with a non-zero exit value

method.name: getExitValue
method.description: * Returns the exit value of the process.

method.name: rethrowFailure
method.description: * Re-throws any failure executing this process. * * @return this * @throws ExecException the execution failure

property.name: exitValue
property.description: * Returns the exit value of the process.
